events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I do not want to keep this item.
The customer's message mentions wanting a refund due to receiving an incorrect product, categorizing this case under Refund.
The case has been assigned to the refunds specialist team to ensure proper handling and timely response.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the received product so we can verify and process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached is a photo showing the product I received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method immediately and send instructions on how to return the incorrect product.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Thank you for making this process easy for me.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you need further assistance.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your order.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support, and have a great day!
